name: MacBook Pro 16-inch (M2 Max)
description: The ultimate MacBook Pro with M2 Max chip, 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 96GB of unified memory.

name: MacBook Air 13-inch (M2)
description: Lightweight and powerful with the M2 chip, 13-inch Liquid Retina display, and all-day battery life.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus
description: A sleek and modern ultrabook with Intel Core i7, InfinityEdge display, and advanced thermal design.

name: Dell XPS 15
description: High-performance laptop featuring Intel Core i9, NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, and a stunning OLED display.

name: HP Spectre x360 14
description: Premium 2-in-1 convertible laptop with a 3:2 OLED display, Intel Evo platform, and excellent battery life.

name: HP Envy 15
description: A creative powerhouse with Intel Core i7, NVIDIA GTX graphics, and a vibrant 4K touchscreen display.

name: MacBook Pro 14-inch (M2 Pro)
description: Powerful 14-inch MacBook Pro with M2 Pro chip, Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 18 hours of battery life.
